comment.body:
AdGuard isn't blocking crap on Amazon Prime Video! 

Getting sick of AdGuard not doing the one thing I paid for it to do.... BLOCK ADS!

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions
performed_via_github_app.description: Automate your workflow from idea to production

issue.title: sourceforge.net
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard Browser Extension ### AdGuard version 5.1.102 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://sourceforge.net/projects/page/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter, EasyList ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter, Fanboy's Social Blocking List ### Annoyances AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Web Annoyances Ultralist ### Security Online Malicious URL Blocklist, Phishing URL Blocklist, uBlock Origin – Badware risks ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Japanese filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Send Do-Not-Track signals ### Add your comment and screenshots ### 描述现象 离谱，开启广告屏蔽器吼，立马网页布局变成IE11的兼容水平，根本就没办法正常阅读，甚至无法正常使用网页里的功能 ### 截图
第一张截图:
### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: selir.net
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://selir.net](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fselir.net) ### Comment > This one I admit is a longshot, but also one that I felt deserved proposing nevertheless. > > Potential tracker(s): A fair few sites load `cdn.ampproject.org` scripts, even if the sites that load them aren't any subdomains of `(...).cdn.ampproject.org`, and even on PC where AMP Project wasn't intended by Google to be used in the first place. > > selirNET, one of the tens of thousands of Indonesian casino spam sites out there, is among them. https://urlscan.io/search/#cdn.ampproject.org list a fair few more, but at least a few of the listed sites (e.g. `crikey•com•au` seem like false positives on urlscanIO's end. > > I propose: > ``` > !#if !env_mobile > ://cdn.ampproject.org/rtv/*/amp-loader-*.mjs|$3p,script > ://cdn.ampproject.org/v*/amp-bind-*.mjs|$3p,script > !#endif > ``` ``` Username: @DandelionSprout ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/l94kxzx78dcg0gkw8wcw0k48owcc4kg6k4sjgsndvw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin v1.64.1b4 System version: | `Windows 11, 24H2 with all monthly updates through July 2025` Browser: | Vivaldi Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
uBlock Origin – Badware risks

Language-specific:
EasyList Lithuania,
Dandelion Sprout's Serbo-Croatian List,
Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters,
Adblock List for Finland Custom filters: | `uBlock Filters (Ads, Quick fixes, Unbreak, Cookie Notices, Annoyances) Bypass Paywalls Clean Filter EasyList Notifications (uBO's version) Fanboy's Agegate List https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DandelionSprout/adfilt/master/AntiMV3List.txt https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DandelionSprout/adfilt2/main/AntiCartoonHipsterList.txt` Other extensions used: | `Bitwarden, Redirector`
